Text: Tak i fʼunyi unyi ko̩ ñw o̩la-wñ ef ewo Defid; oñ i ñwʼuña che tod akpati O̩jo̩, i la fʼunyabo fa ñw u.
Taku Defid kakini, I dukpe̩ kʼene̩ du ki ne̩ akpati O̩jo̩ tʼabo Lifai le n; todu ama chʼabo ki Jihofa chi ma ku ma ne̩ akpati O̩jo̩, ku ma lañʼache̩ e̩wñ ñw u o̩gbe̩gbe̩le̩.
Taku Defid kʼabo Israe̩l du wa jeju Je̩rusale̩m, ku ma dʼakpati Jihofa te̩gu wa uña-wñ e-kʼi ñwo̩che tane̩ ñw u.
Defid la kʼamo̩ma Aro̩n kpai abo Lifai wa jʼugbokate.
Abo ku ma chʼamo̩ma Kohat che, Urie̩l chʼagboji-ma, kpʼamo̩maye-wñ ku ma chʼone̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩fa;
e-amo̩ma Me̩rari, Asaya chʼagboji-ma, oñ amo̩maye-wñ chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩;
e-amo̩ma Ge̩rsho̩m, Joe̩l chʼagboji-ma, amo̩maye-wñ la chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa;
e-amo̩ma Ilaizefan, She̩maya chagboji-ma, amo̩maye-wñ la chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩;
e-amo̩ma He̩bro̩n, Ilaie̩l chʼagboji-ma, amo̩maye-wñ la chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩le̩;
e-amo̩ma Uzie̩l, Aminadab chʼagboji-ma, oñ amo̩maye-wñ chʼogu me̩lu nyoke me̩gweji.
Taku Defid fu Zedo̩k kpʼAbayata amatama do̩ wa, kpʼabo Lifai, owñ che Urie̩l kpai Asaya kpai Joe̩l kpai She̩maya kpai Ilaie̩l kpʼAminadab,
oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, A me̩ chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata abo Lifai: me̩ chʼo̩la-me̩ ku me̩ fo̩, tʼame̩ tʼamo̩maye-me̩, kʼame̩ ki dʼakpati Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, wʼugbo kʼu ñwo̩che te̩ ñw u.
Todabu ki ma chʼame̩ nʼe̩ e̩gba ejodudu le̩ n, Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa, muke̩che̩ bʼuwa ma, todu a tene ugbo-wñ, alu kʼoji ajo̩ ka kʼa che n.
Abe̩le̩ amatama kpʼabo Lifai chʼo̩la-ma ku ma fo̩ ku ma dʼakpati Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l le̩, te̩gu wa.
Tak amo̩ma Lifai mʼugbo̩lo̩ oli kʼakpati O̩jo̩ lo̩ko̩li o̩la-wñ du nʼika-ma alu ku Mose̩s ñwa ñwu ma teju o̩la ki Jihofa ka le̩.
Taku Defid ko̩la ñw agboji abo Lifai ku ma kʼamo̩maye-ma ku ma keli dago jo̩, kʼe̩wñ iya ki jʼo̩wo̩-ma, kʼubo̩ kpʼumolo kpʼeicha ki ka dufu, ku ma chʼomu uyo̩ taa!
Oñ abo Lifai chi Himan, o̩ma Joe̩l; ma chi Esaf o̩ma Be̩rakaya, kwef amo̩maye-wñ; oñ ma chi Etau, o̩ma Kushaya, kwef amo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼamo̩ma Me̩rari;

ma laño̩ chi amo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼo̩gba ekeji ku ma de alo̩na; ama che Ze̩karaya, Be̩n kpai Jeezie̩l, She̩maira-mo̩t kpai Je̩haie̩l kpai Unai, E̩liab kpai Be̩naya kpai Maaseya kpai Matitaya kpai Ilife̩li kpai Mikneya kpai Obe̩d-ido̩m kpai Jeaye̩l.
Abe̩le̩ amakeli Himan kpai Esaf kpai Itan jo̩ kpai oke ki chʼebijeikpa ku ma nu gogogogo,
kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Ezie̩l kpai She̩mairamo̩t kpai Jehaie̩l kpai Unai kpai E̩liab kpai Maaseya kpai Be̩naya kpai ubo̩ ku ma nu uko̩la Alamot;
kpai Matataiya kpai Ilife̩li kpai Mikneya kpai Obe̩d-ido̩m kpai Jeaye̩l kpai Azazaya, umolo-ma la chʼuko̩la She̩minit ku ma tʼo̩gba eli.
Oñ Ke̩nanaya ki chʼagboji abo Lifai chʼutodu eli; i ko̩ ma eli edu kwane̩, todu kʼi chʼo̩ka-wñ.
Be̩rakaya kpai E̩lke̩na chʼamade alo̩na todu akpati le̩.

Oñ She̩banaya kpai Jiho̩shafat kpai Ne̩tane̩l kpai Amesai kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Be̩naya kpai E̩lieza, amatama le̩, nʼo̩kakachi afa o̩gba akpati O̩jo̩; oñ Obe̩d-ido̩m kpai Je̩haya chʼamadʼalo̩na tod akpati le̩.
Abe̩le̩ Defid kpʼabogijo Israe̩l kpʼamagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, nyʼadʼakpati alo Jihofa kwef unyi Obe̩d-ido̩m te̩gu wa kpʼuyo̩.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼO̩jo̩ te̩ko abo Lifai ku ma nʼakpati alo Jihofa, tak ama mʼamo̩kokuno̩ mebie kpʼamokolo mebie ko chʼiche̩bo̩.
Defid la nyi otogbo ku ma nʼukpo line̩n ku ma hi reju ga manyʼabo Lifai ku ma nʼakpati le̩ chaka kpʼamakeli kpai Ke̩nanaya kʼi chʼagboji kʼi adʼeli kpʼamakeli; Defid la nʼe̩fo̩d line̩n efufu o̩la.
Abe̩le̩ oñ abo Israe̩l du dʼakpati alo Jihofa te̩gu wa kpʼoga echi, kpʼuko̩la bijila, kpʼo̩kakachi, kpʼoke, ma la nu ubo̩ kpʼumolo kʼamone̩ agbo̩.
Oñ i lewatu, abu kʼakpati alo Jihofa lewa ewo Defid, Maikal, o̩ma So̩l le̩, nyʼope go, oñ i li abu ku Defid, ki chʼonu, do̩mo̩ atido, kʼi achiya, oñ i chʼe̩de̩te̩-wñ ef e̩do̩-wñ.
